channel.title: Vegetation Structural Complexity on Gustavo B Paterno
channel.description: Recent content in Vegetation Structural Complexity on Gustavo B Paterno

item.title: Combining planting trees and natural regeneration promotes long-term structural complexity in oil palm landscapes
item.description: Abstract Vegetation structural complexity has been identified as a vital factor for forest ecosystem function, stability, and resilience. However, agricultural land with much reduced structural complexity has largely replaced natural forests in the tropics. Therefore, restoring structural complexity in large-scale plantation monocultures by introducing agroforestry systems may counteract the loss of biodiversity and ecosystem functions. However, we still have limited knowledge of how the structural complexity of agroforests develops under different restoration treatments.
